testCase.name: ThemeService should create
ThemeService initialize should set the light theme if schema does not match
ThemeService initialize should set the dark theme if schema matches
ThemeService initialize should set the subject with correct value
PaletteComponent should create
PaletteComponent should color data attribute equals to color input
LabelComponent should create
LabelComponent should Host have data-cy attribute equals to testId input
LabelComponent should color data attribute equals to color input
LabelComponent should size data attribute equals to size input
LabelComponent should ellipsis data attribute equals to ellipsis input
LabelComponent should underline data attribute equals to underline input
LabelComponent should disabled data attribute equals to disabled input
LabelComponent should pointer data attribute equals to pointer input
LabelComponent should display the projected content correctly
LabelComponent should label for attribute equals to for input
ButtonComponent should create
ButtonComponent should type data attribute equals to type input
ButtonComponent label should display label if loading is false
ButtonComponent label should label color equals to sun when button type is primary
ButtonComponent label should label color equals to info when button type is secondary
ButtonComponent label should label color equals to white when button type is danger
ButtonComponent should display icon if loading is true
ButtonComponent should Host have data-cy attribute equals to testId input
ButtonComponent should display the projected content correctly
AppComponent should create
AppComponent ngOnInit should call theme service methods for setting the theme
AppComponent ngOnInit should assign the theme data to the theme$ variable
AppComponent setColor should set the selectedColor variable to passed color value
